description: Somewhere in the vast sea of the Internet, there's a website that can only be accessed at the stroke of midnight. Known as the Jigoku Tsushin, rumor has it that if you post a grudge there, the Jigoku Shoujo will appear and drag whoever torments you into the inferno. Very little is known about the girl - all we know for sure is that she lives with her equally enigmatic grandmother, that three magical straw dolls accompany and serve her, and that whenever a posting on the Jigoku Tsushin moves her, she becomes the Jigoku Shoujo.
synonyms: สัญญามรณะ ธิดาอเวจี ภาคที่ 1

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Oiran
tags.description: Prominently features a courtesan character of the Japanese Edo Period.

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Blackmail
tags.description: Features a character blackmailing another.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Torture
tags.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

tags.name: Aliens
tags.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

tags.name: Circus
tags.description: Prominently features a circus.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Veterinarian
tags.description: Prominently features a veterinarian or one of the main characters is a veterinarian.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

name.native: ジル･ドゥ･ロンフェール

node.description:
[Profile](https://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/notomamiko/)

A Japanese actress, voice actress, and singer. She is married and has one kid.

**Non-anime roles:**
- Shinano - Azur Lane (VG)
- Emma - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Skirk - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Durandal - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Jun Kazama - Tekken series (VG)
- Mother - Avataro Sentai Donbrothers (Super Sentai) 
- Rella Melancoryphus Cygnus - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Yi Xuan - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

__Hometown:__ Riverside, California Twitter | Instagram Between voice acting, script-adapting, and directing, Patrick Seitz has had the pleasure of working on hundreds of different video games and anime series over the past 20 years. His voice credits include Endeavor MHA, Franky One Piece, Dio JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure, plus a variety of video game voices like Arthas Menethil and Garrosh Hellscream from World of Warcraft. Seitz’s script-adapting credits include the English dubs of the animated feature films Summer Wars and Wolf Children, as well as series such as Aggretsuko, and he has directed a bevy of Japanese RPGs. _Source: Crunchyroll Expo 2020_

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/jmichaeltatum)

Married to fellow voice actor [Brandon McInnis](https://anilist.co/staff/127809/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nassy_takanashi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nassy_takanashi/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/64mecceQewFCKwCK6JBW0o)

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

__Place of Birth:__ Los Angeles, California, USA

An American voice director, script writer, voice actor, and former child actor. He is known for directing and writing many English language anime titles for New Generation Pictures, most notably R.O.D the TV and Hellsing. He is also co-directing BECK: Mongolian Chop Squad with Christopher Bevins for FUNimation. Jaffe has also written many articles and spoken as a guest lecturer at universities and libraries. 

(Source: Wikipedia)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t0mori)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t0mori)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t0mori)

Yukie, previously known as Snow (stylized SNoW), is a J-Pop singer. She currently attends Santa Monica College in California. She has grown up in a bilingual environment. Her favorite artists include Ani DiFranco, Iggy Pop, Talking Heads, and Jack Johnson.  According to her official blog, she stated that the strain from both her professional and personal life was taking its toll. As a result, she decided to take a break from her music in order to continue with her studies. In a blog entry dated April 10, 2008 she revealed her new stage name to be "Yukie".  (Source: Wikipedia)
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/西田マサラ)
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/西田マサラ)

Hiromi Mizutani is a composer and arranger from Nagoya, Japan.  In addition to Zill O'll -infinite- and Yuusha 30, Hiromi Mizutani also composed music for the game Red Seeds Profile, known as Deadly Premonition outside of Japan.  He is a member of Team-MAX along with Yasuharu Takanashi, Kenji Fujisawa, Hiroshi Motofuji, Shuji Katayama and REMI.
[Website](http://gingami.art.coocan.jp/)

Originating from Studio Live. Notable works as a character designer include [Jigoku Shoujo](https://anilist.co/anime/228/), [Ghost Hound](https://anilist.co/anime/2596/) and [Nurarihyon no Mago](https://anilist.co/anime/7592/). Close friends with [Hiroshi Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/101189/), and often designs the characters for the shows which he directs.
